Subject: RE: Fowler High School HVAC Project 
Hello Javier, 
Please advise if we will be able to begin the following exterior work, ahead of March 25, 2024, as 
discussed at our site visit? 
Concrete Equipment Pads 
Drywells 
Underground Electrical 
Please also advise when we should anticipate being able to access the gym to complete the demo 
of existing Evaporative Coolers on Roof per Plan Sheet M1.12? It is assumed that these should 
remain operational until new units are up and running! 
New Units are still scheduled to ship on Monday, April 22, 2024 and it is estimated to take 4-5 
calendar days for arrival. Please advise when we should plan to crane new units onto pads? 
Thank you, 
Lyle Bolte 
BDM Inc.

Hanford, Ca 93230

documents.summary: Email exchange from February 26-28, 2024 between BDM Inc (Lyle Bolte) and Integrated Designs/SOMAM regarding RFI responses #3-6 for electrical and fire alarm work at Fowler HS Gym HVAC project. BDM states the RFI responses are unacceptable and requests final responses. Also discusses construction schedule and exterior work permissions.

Subject: RE: Fowler High School HVAC Project 
Hello Javier, 
Please advise if we will be able to begin the following exterior work, ahead of March 25, 2024, as 
discussed at our site visit? 
Concrete Equipment Pads 
Drywells 
Underground Electrical 
Please also advise when we should anticipate being able to access the gym to complete the demo 
of existing Evaporative Coolers on Roof per Plan Sheet M1.12? It is assumed that these should 
remain operational until new units are up and running! 
New Units are still scheduled to ship on Monday, April 22, 2024 and it is estimated to take 4-5 
calendar days for arrival. Please advise when we should plan to crane new units onto pads?
